Body: Which hardware sensors are supported by Android? Are there any imaginable sensors that may be planned to be supported in the future? For every sensor:How is the sensor useful?Which devices currently have it? (Only for new sensors)What do notable apps use the sensor?Here is a list of currently supported hardware sensors:Environment Sensorsambient humidityilluminanceambient pressureambient temperature Device temperatureMotion sensorsaccelerometergyroscopePosition sensorsgeomagnetic field sensorthe proximity sensor  The orientation sensor is software-based and derives its data from the  accelerometer and the geomagnetic field sensor.
Title: Which hardware sensors are supported by Android?

history.Text: Which sensors are supported by android? Is there any sensor planed to be supported in future? For every sensor:- How dose the sensor can be useful?- Which devises currently have it? (Only for new sensors)- What do notable apps use the sensor?Please introduce one sensor per answer.
Which sensors are supported by android?

history.Text: Which hardware sensors are supported by Android? Are there any imaginable sensors that may be planned to be supported in the future? For every sensor:- How is the sensor useful?- Which devices currently have it? (Only for new sensors)- What do notable apps use the sensor?Here is a list of currently supported hardware sensors:**Environment Sensors**- ambient humidity- illuminance- ambient pressure- ambient temperature - Device temperature**Motion sensors**- accelerometer- gyroscope**Position sensors**-  geomagnetic field sensor-  the proximity sensor> The orientation sensor is software-based and derives its data from the> accelerometer and the geomagnetic field sensor.
